verses.text: Ha wach'ilal yet' tojolal ol in b'itej. Mamin Jehová in gana tzin b'itan t'ayach.
Snib'ej in k'ol tzin b'eyb'alej tojolal. ¿B'aq'uinhtax val ol ach och ved'oc? Malaj mach ol alan jab'oc chucal t'ayin yuj in b'eyb'al t'a in palacio.
Malaj b'ak'uinh ol in b'at q'uelan t'a chuc pensaril. Ach in Diosal, max yal-laj in k'ol sb'eyb'al eb' tzach paticaneli. Malaj b'ak'uinh ol in cha ja eb' t'a in tz'ey.
Najat ol vik'canel chucal t'a in pensar. Malaj valan vic yet' eb' sk'ulan chucal chi'.
Ol in satel eb' k'ub'eltac tz'alan specal eb' anima. Ha eb' ak'umtac yet' eb' syik'chaanh sb'a, manh ol techajlaj eb' vuuj.
Ol wila'' mach eb' k'anab'ajum t'a sat lum lum tik, a eb' ol munlaj ved'oc. Anhej eb' wach' sb'eyb'al ol och in checab'oc.
Manh ol in cha ajlaj eb' ixtum anima t'a in palacio. Ha eb' naumchaanh lolonel, manh ol in cha ajlaj eb' t'a vichanh.
Mamin Jehová, t'a junjun k'u ol in satel eb' chuc cajan t'a sat co lum tik. Ol in satel masanil eb' sk'ulan chucal t'a yol a chonhab'.
